name: Field Promotion
Lore: 'Imperial officers are fiercely competitive, especially on the Executor. Lord Vader''s flagship is a place where devious political calculation prospers. The naive are doomed to failure.',
Text: 'Deploy on an Imperial of ability < 5 present with Vader, Emperor or one of your admirals, generals, or moffs. Imperial gains {leader} skill, is power +1, and is immune to Demotion, Report to Lord Vader, and What is Thy Bidding, My Master? (Immune to Alter.)',
